businfo:
Lotus Diagnostic Centre in Indiranagar, Bangalore

Location and Overview:
Making conscientious strides in the field of diagnostic medicine is Lotus Diagnostic Centre in Indiranagar, Bangalore. Established in the year 2003 under the aegis of a doctor couple Dr Anil Agarwal and Dr Gunjan Agarwal, this diagnostic centre has grown by leaps and bounds. Since their inception, they have grown to become one of the leading providers of diagnostic services in the city. Located in close proximity to the city's airport and just minutes away from the IT hub of Whitefield and Ring road, this centre is prominently located near ICICI Bank at CMH Road. They are open to customers from 7.00 am to 8.00 pm from Mondays to Saturdays, and from 8.00 am to 1.00 pm on Sundays.

Infrastructure and Other Facilities available at Lotus Diagnostic Centre

Known to employ the latest in cutting edge technology, Lotus Diagnostic Centre in Indiranagar houses state-of-the-art equipments for assessment of blood work like hormonal assays, pregnancy profiles, digital x-rays, ECG, echocardiography, cardiac stress test, pulmonary function test, mammography and much more. Their in-house 4D Ultrasound scanner takes life-like quality images and its extensively used for ultrasonography. They associate with the best in the industry and employ more than 30 consultants and experts across all specialties, namely Physiotherapy, Surgical Oncology, Psychiatry, Cardiology, Gastroenterology, ENT Surgery, Orthopedics, Neurology, Diabetology, Endocrinology , Dermatology, Cosmetology , Ophthalmology, General Surgery, Andrology, Fertility Specialist, Obstetrics & Gynecology, Pediatrics, General Medicine and Radiology. All the lab techniques used are in strict adherence to various standards and protocols used in the industry practice. This measure ensures high accuracy and reliability of results and reporting. For the convenience of their customers, this centre has also made provisions to collect a patient's sample from their home. One can opt for one of their various comprehensive health checkup packages such as pre-employment checkups and master health checkups as well. Lotus Diagnostic Centre in Bangalore has also tied up with a large number of leading national and international corporates to provide them various services like pre-employment checkup packages, annual medical health checks and on-site medical checks. Most of the packages are tailor-made to suit the needs and requirements of the corporates. It has also become the centre of choice of renowned insurance companies and TPAs. This establishment accepts payments made through cash, credit card, debit cards and other modes of payments. Undoubtedly it is one of the best diagnostic centres in Indiranagar Bangalore.

businfo:
Manipal North Side Hospital in Malleswaram, Bangalore

This hospital is part of the Manipal Hospitals Group which is part of the Manipal Education and Medical Group (MEMG). Manipal North Side Hospital is located at Malleswaram and known as the neighbourhood hospital. The hospital is a 70 bed facility and has a team of dedicated and experienced doctors, consultants and support staff. The hospital offers affordable and quality health care services. It is especially known for its services in the fields of General Medicine, Orthopaedics and Gynaecology for quite some time now.

The hospital was established in the year 1993 and from them on it has expanded its medical services to the specialized fields of Renal Science, Paediatric Surgery, Plastic Surgery, Spine Surgery and Surgical Gastroentrology. It is a super speciality landmark hospital in the area. The hospital caters to over 200 patients every month. The hospital provides all the latest medical services and also offers top rated diagnostic services like a fully equipped modern laboratory, ultra sonography, various endoscopes, image intensifier X-Ray’s and CT Scans. The Hospital is ISO 9001-2008 certified for clinical, nursing, diagnostics & allied areas.

Services at Manipal North Side Hospital, Bangalore

Manipal Hospital Malleswaram, offers a wide range of medical services through their various departments. Following are the departments at the hospital: Accident & Emergency, Anaesthesiology, Cardiology, Critical Care Medicine, Dermatology, Diabetes & Endocrinology, Dietetics, ENT, Fetal Medicine, Gastroenterology, General Surgery, Genetics, Internal Medicine, Laboratory Services, Andrology & Reproductive Services, Health Check, Medical Oncology & Haematology, Minimally Invasive Surgery, Nephrology, Neuro Surgery, Neurology, Nuclear Medicine, Obstetrics & Gynaecology, Ophthalmology, Orthopaedics, Paediatric Endocrinology, Paediatric Surgery, Paediatrics, Physical Medicine & Rehabilitation, Plastic Surgery, Psychiatry, Radiation Oncology, Radiology, Respiratory Medicine, Rheumatology, Sports & Exercise medicine, Stem Cell, Surgical Gastroenterology, Surgical Oncology, Transfusion Services (Blood Bank), Urology and Vascular surgery.

More about the Hospital Group

Manipal Hospital in Bangalore is located at three places HAL Airport road, Jayanagar and Malleswaram. It has hospitals in Tumkur, Salem, Mangalore, Goa, Vijayawada and Vishakapatnam. It has five tertiary care, nine secondary care and three primary care clinics across these five states. The hospital offers various facilities like Internal Medicine, OBG, Urology, General Surgery, Paediatric surgery, Nephrology, Orthopaedics, Gastroenterology, Neurology, Neuro surgery, ENT, Dermatology, Paediatric Dermatology,Plastic surgery, Spine Surgery, Dietetics, Dental, Medical Oncology and Radiology. Today this healthcare brand in one of the most trusted names in Bangalore.
